When <S%G3752><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Thou Doest <S%G4160><s%> <S%G1654><s%> Alms, <S%G3361><s%> Do Not Sound A Trumpet <S%G4537><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> Thee, <S%G4675><s%> As <S%G5618><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hypocrites <S%G5273><s%> Do <S%G4160><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Synagogues <S%G4864><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Streets, <S%G4505><s%> That <S%G3704><s%> They May Have Glory <S%G1392><s%> From <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men. <S%G444><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> They Have <S%G568><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3408><s%> Their Reward. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G4675><s%> But Thou <S%G1161><s%> Doing <S%G4160><s%> <S%G1654><s%> Alms, <S%G3361><s%> Let Not Know <S%G1097><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G710><s%> Thy Left Hand <S%G4675><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Does <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1188><s%> Thy Right Hand, <S%G4675><s%>

So That <S%G3704><s%> May Be <S%G5600><s%> Thine <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Alms <S%G1654><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Secret : <S%G2927><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Thy Father <S%G4675><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Sees <S%G991><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Secret <S%G2927><s%> , Himself <S%G846><s%> Shall Render <S%G591><s%> <S%G4671><s%> To Thee <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Openly. <S%G5318><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> , Thou Prayest, <S%G4336><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thou Shalt Not Be <S%G2071><s%> As <S%G5618><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> They Love <S%G5368><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Synagogues <S%G4864><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Corners <S%G1137><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Streets <S%G4113><s%> Standing <S%G2476><s%> To Pray, <S%G4336><s%> <S%G3704><s%> So That <S%G302><s%> They May Appear <S%G5316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Men. <S%G444><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> They Have <S%G568><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Reward <S%G3408><s%> Their. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G4771><s%> But Thou, <S%G1161><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Thou Prayest, <S%G4336><s%> Enter <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5009><s%> Thy Chamber, <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Shut <S%G2808><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2374><s%> Thy Door, <S%G4675><s%> Pray <S%G4336><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> To Thy Father <S%G4675><s%> Who Is <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Secret; <S%G2927><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Thy Father <S%G4675><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Sees <S%G991><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Secret <S%G2927><s%> Will Render <S%G591><s%> <S%G4671><s%> To Thee <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Openly. <S%G5318><s%>

<S%G4336><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But When Ye Pray <S%G3361><s%> , Do Not Use Vain Repetitions, <S%G945><s%> As <S%G5618><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heathens : <S%G1482><s%> <S%G1380><s%> For They Think <S%G1063><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Much Speaking <S%G4180><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> They Shall Be Heard. <S%G1522><s%>

Not <S%G3361><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Be Like <S%G3666><s%> To Them : <S%G846><s%> <S%G1492><s%> For Knows <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Your Father <S%G5216><s%> Of What Things <S%G3739><s%> Need <S%G5532><s%> Ye Have <S%G2192><s%> Before <S%G4253><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Ye <S%G5209><s%> Ask <S%G154><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

Thus <S%G3779><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Pray <S%G4336><s%> Ye : <S%G5210><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Our Father <S%G2257><s%> Who Art <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens, <S%G3772><s%> Sanctified Be <S%G37><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> Thy Name; <S%G4675><s%>

Let Come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G932><s%> Thy Kingdom; <S%G4675><s%> Let Be Done <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2307><s%> Thy Will <S%G4675><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Heaven, So <S%G3772><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth; <S%G1093><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> And <S%G3361><s%> Lead Not <S%G1533><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> , Temptation, <S%G3986><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Deliver <S%G4506><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Evil. <S%G4190><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Thine <S%G4675><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

<S%G1437><s%> For If <S%G1063><s%> Ye Forgive <S%G863><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3900><s%> Their Offences, <S%G846><s%> Will Forgive <S%G863><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Your Father <S%G5216><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavenly. <S%G3770><s%>

<S%G1437><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Ye Forgive <S%G863><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3900><s%> , Their Offences, <S%G846><s%> Neither <S%G3761><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> Will Forgive <S%G863><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3900><s%> Your Offences. <S%G5216><s%>

<S%G3752><s%> And When <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3522><s%> Ye Fast, <S%G3361><s%> Be Not <S%G1096><s%> As <S%G5618><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> Downcast In Countenance; <S%G4659><s%> <S%G853><s%> For They Disfigure <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4383><s%> Their Faces, <S%G846><s%> So That <S%G3704><s%> They May Appear <S%G5316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Men <S%G444><s%> Fasting. <S%G3522><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> They Have <S%G568><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3408><s%> Their Reward. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3704><s%> So That <S%G3361><s%> Thou Mayest Not Appear <S%G5316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Men <S%G444><s%> Fasting, <S%G3522><s%> But <S%G235><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> Who Is <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Secret; <S%G2927><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Thy Father <S%G4675><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Sees <S%G991><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Secret <S%G2927><s%> Will Render <S%G591><s%> <S%G4671><s%> To Thee <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Openly. <S%G5318><s%>

<S%G3361><s%> Treasure Not Up <S%G2343><s%> For Yourselves <S%G5213><s%> Treasures <S%G2344><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> Moth <S%G4597><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Rust <S%G1035><s%> Spoil, <S%G853><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> Thieves <S%G2812><s%> Dig Through <S%G1358><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Steal : <S%G2813><s%>

<S%G2343><s%> But Treasure Up <S%G1161><s%> For Yourselves <S%G5213><s%> Treasures <S%G2344><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> Neither <S%G3777><s%> Moth <S%G4597><s%> Nor <S%G3777><s%> Rust <S%G1035><s%> Spoils <S%G853><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> Thieves <S%G2812><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Do Not Dig Through <S%G1358><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Steal : <S%G2813><s%>

<S%G3699><s%> For Where <S%G1063><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Treasure <S%G2344><s%> , Your, <S%G5216><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Will Be <S%G2071><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Heart <S%G2588><s%> Your. <S%G5216><s%>

<S%G1437><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3788><s%> Thine Eye <S%G4675><s%> Evil <S%G4190><s%> Be, <S%G5600><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4983><s%> Thy Body <S%G4675><s%> Dark <S%G4652><s%> Will Be. <S%G2071><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Light <S%G5457><s%> That Is <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> Darkness <S%G4655><s%> , Is, <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Darkness <S%G4655><s%> How Great. <S%G4214><s%>

No One <S%G3762><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Lords <S%G2962><s%> To Serve; <S%G1398><s%> <S%G2228><s%> For Either <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> He Will Hate, <S%G3404><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other <S%G2087><s%> He Will Love; <S%G25><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> The One <S%G1520><s%> He Will Hold To, <S%G472><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other <S%G2087><s%> He Will Despise. <S%G2706><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Are Not Able <S%G1410><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> To Serve <S%G1398><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Mammon. <S%G3126><s%> <S%G3126><s%>

Because <S%G1223><s%> Of This <S%G5124><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> , <S%G5213><s%> To You, <S%G3361><s%> Be Not Careful <S%G3309><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> , As To Your Life, <S%G5216><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Ye Should Eat <S%G5315><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> , Ye Should Drink; <S%G4095><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4983><s%> , As To Your Body <S%G5216><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Ye Should Put On. <S%G1746><s%> Not <S%G3780><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Life <S%G5590><s%> More <S%G4119><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Than The <S%G3588><s%> Food <S%G5160><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> Than The <S%G3588><s%> ; Raiment? <S%G1742><s%>

Look <S%G1689><s%> At <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Birds <S%G4071><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Sow Not, <S%G4687><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Do They Reap, <S%G2325><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Do They Gather <S%G4863><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Granaries, <S%G596><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Your Father <S%G5216><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavenly <S%G3770><s%> Feeds <S%G5142><s%> Them : <S%G846><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Much <S%G3123><s%> Are Better <S%G1308><s%> ; Than They? <S%G846><s%>

<S%G5101><s%> But Which <S%G1161><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> By Being Careful <S%G3309><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%> To Add <S%G4369><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2244><s%> His Stature <S%G846><s%> Cubit <S%G4083><s%> ; One? <S%G1520><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> About <S%G4012><s%> Raiment <S%G1742><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> ; Are Ye Careful? <S%G3309><s%> Observe <S%G2648><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lilies <S%G2918><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Field, <S%G68><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> They Grow : <S%G837><s%> <S%G3756><s%> , They Labour Not <S%G2872><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Do They Spin : <S%G3514><s%>

I Say <S%G3004><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Not Even <S%G3761><s%> Solomon <S%G4672><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1391><s%> His Glory <S%G846><s%> Was Clothed <S%G4016><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of These. <S%G5130><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Grass <S%G5528><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Field, <S%G68><s%> To Day <S%G4594><s%> Which Is <S%G5607><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Tomorrow <S%G839><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Oven <S%G2823><s%> Is Cast, <S%G906><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Arrays, <S%G294><s%> Will He Not <S%G3756><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> , You, <S%G5209><s%> ; O Ye Of Little Faith? <S%G3640><s%>

Not <S%G3361><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Be Careful, <S%G3309><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> ; Shall We Eat? <S%G5315><s%> , Or <S%G2228><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> ; Shall We Drink? <S%G4095><s%> , Or <S%G2228><s%> With What <S%G5101><s%> ; Shall We Be Clothed? <S%G4016><s%>

<S%G3956><s%> For All <S%G1063><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> Seek After. <S%G1934><s%> <S%G1492><s%> For Knows <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Your Father <S%G5216><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavenly <S%G3770><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Ye Have Need <S%G5535><s%> Of These Things <S%G5130><s%> All. <S%G537><s%>

<S%G2212><s%> But Seek Ye <S%G1161><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1343><s%> His Righteousness, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Shall Be Added <S%G4369><s%> To You. <S%G5213><s%>

Not <S%G3361><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Be Careful <S%G3309><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Morrow : <S%G839><s%> <S%G3588><s%> For The <S%G1063><s%> Morrow <S%G839><s%> Shall Be Careful About <S%G3309><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Of Itself. <S%G1438><s%> Sufficient <S%G713><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Is The <S%G3588><s%> Evil <S%G2549><s%> Of It. <S%G846><s%>
